Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.ui.swing.interfaces

Interface JComponentInterface

All Known Subinterfaces:
JExtendedComponentInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
JButtonWithMeta, JCheckBoxWithMeta, JColorPairPickerWithMeta, JColorPickerWithMeta, JDateFieldWithMeta, JDateSelectionDialog, JEnumFieldWithMeta, JFileFieldWithMeta, JFormattedTextFieldWithMeta, JIntegerFieldWithMeta, JNumericFieldWithMeta, JRadioButtonWithMeta, JTextFieldWithMeta
public interface JComponentInterface

This interface associated with all swing components in the application form.

Since:
0.0.2
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
LastUpdate:
0.0.3

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void assignValueToComponent​(java.lang.Object value)
    Assing new value to component
    java.lang.Object getChangedValueFromComponent()
    Get value from component before it's commit

    Get raw data from component

    Get current value from component

  • Method Details

    • getRawDataFromComponent

      java.lang.String getRawDataFromComponent()

      Get raw data from component

      Returns:
      raw data from component

    • getValueFromComponent

      java.lang.Object getValueFromComponent()

      Get current value from component

      Returns:
      value changed but not commited yet

    • getChangedValueFromComponent

      java.lang.Object getChangedValueFromComponent() throws SyntaxException

      Get value from component before it's commit

      Returns:
      value changed but not commited yet
      Throws:
      SyntaxException - when component contains invalid content

    • assignValueToComponent

      void assignValueToComponent​(java.lang.Object value) throws ContentException

      Assing new value to component

      Parameters:
      value - value to assign
      Throws:
      ContentException - when new value is incompatible with the given control

    • getValueType

      java.lang.Class<?> getValueType()

      Get current value type in the component

      Returns:
      current value type. Can't be null

    • standardValidation

      java.lang.String standardValidation​(java.lang.String value)

      Perform standard validation of the content

      Parameters:
      value - String representation of the content to validate
      Returns:
      null on success, otherwise error description

    • setInvalid

      void setInvalid​(boolean invalid)

      Mark content as valid/invalid

      Parameters:
      invalid - true means invalid content

    • isInvalid

      boolean isInvalid()

      Is current content invalid

      Returns:
      true if the content is invalid
